name: deconstructive_tiles
title: Deconstructive Tiles
author: notquitenull
description: Deconstructive Tiles adds new tiles which when built order the deconstruction of whatever is built in their position (that includes their ghost if placed as such -> no manual cleanup required) Graphics temporarrily Hijacked from Dectorio (https://github.com/jpanther/dectorio) will be replaced later.
